title: WHY TF ARE THERE BOTS IN ARAM I WANT TO PLAY PVP NOT BOTS
body: I was in champ select and i noticed that my whole team i was playing with were all bots, i said NOPE and left because all they do is feed and i got a 15 min ban gg riot pls

replies.body: Um quick question, how do u know if they are bots. Not being mean or anything but my friend also said the same thing and i dont know how they are bots. Anyway lots of people get banned all u can do is wait it out.
they are bots when they usually have a username ending with 'z', run the snowball and ghost and build boots of swiftness first item
yer iv been wondering if they are bots if you say hi and they say this [....................] then they bots or if they say 10101010010101010
